name: Rabbit Wrangler
description:
The bunnies are running amok and getting themselves lost, or worse. A lone rancher must keep the herd of 100 bunnies together... or at least most of them. How many bunnies can you manage for five minutes?

This game is my entry into the GMTK 2020 Game Jam. It's probably more of an interactive simulation than a game, but I had fun making it. Share your high scores in the comments.

Developed using the Godot engine, licensed under the MIT license

Most of the art, music, and fonts came from the Kenney Game Assets 1, licensed under the CC0 1.0 license. Honestly, given how much work this was for one person, I don't think this project would have been completed in time were it not for these assets, so huge thanks to Kenney.

EDIT: The source code upload I had was broken, but since the review period has started, I can't upload the correct ZIP. If you want to see the source code, you can download it from https://lrflew.com/Rabbit%20Wrangler%20Source.zip, but the builds available here are enough to rate the game.
